构造方法摘要
TestDie()
           
 
方法摘要
protected  void setUp()
           
protected  void tearDown()
           
 void testConstructorNoArgs()
          Test the constructor without arguments of Die and the side count getter Die.numOfSides()
 void testConstructorWithArgs()
          Test the constructor with legal argument of Die and the side count getter Die.numOfSides()
 void testConstructorWithIllArgs()
          Test the constructor with illegal argument of Die
 void testRollDef()
          Test Die.roll() of the default Die.
 void testRollRand()
          Test Die.roll() of the random Die.
 void testRollSep()
          Test Die.roll() of the specified Die.
 void testTopFaceDef()
          Test Die.topFace() of a rolled default Die
 void testTopFaceRand()
          Test Die.topFace() of a rolled random Die
 void testTopFaceSep()
          Test Die.topFace() of a rolled specified Die
